body:
This just in…

Sebastian Michaelis was scrolling through netflix when he came across an anime with what looked like a cute cat as the star, only to be devastated to find it was an angry red panda.

summary: Meeting the Families: Part 2 *several hours later* Haida: ......*jumps up, into consciousness* GUH! Wha?! ....*looks around, and...
body:
Meeting the Families: Part 2

*several hours later*

Haida: ……*jumps up, into consciousness* GUH! Wha?! ….*looks around, and finds he’s in a rather traditional Japanese-style house* ….where…where am I?

Rie: You’re at our house, dear.

Haida: *looks to his side, to see Rie* Wha, what happened?

Rie: *sigh* My husband, and my son attacked you. My sincerest apologies.

Haida: Erm, it’s alright…I think.

Rie: Well, no, it isn’t. But regardless. I knew neither of them were very excited for you to arrive, mainly because…well, Ikari.

Haida: …oh.

Rie: Yes, when we found out the news, and how that came about…suffice to say, we were a touch shocked, understand.

Haida: Absolutely.

Rie: I, personally, accepted it rather happily. But of course, that is just me….well! I think I have rambled long enough. What say we go join everyone for dinner? Hmm?

Haida: Uh, yeah! Sounds great!

Rie: Wonderful. 😊

*they get up, and quickly make their way to the dining room, where everyone else is gathered to eat*

Hiroko: So, then he was like, “bah, someone like you couldn’t carry this thing! Lemme take care of this!” He ended up in the hospital two hours later.

Riko: Wow!

Harumi: Yeah, she does a lot of stuff like that…oh! Haida! Come sit!

Retsuko: Are you okay? I’m so sorry about that. 😓

Haida: Oh, no! I’m fine! *sits right next to Retsuko*

Ryota: *staring at them* …hmm.

Retsuko: …um…Haida? This is my dad, Ryota.

Haida: *stretches his arm out* Honor to meet you, sir! 🙂

Ryota: …

Rie: Ryota, come on…

Ryota: …*reluctantly shakes Haida’s hand* Likewise, I suppose.

Retsuko: …and this is my little brother, Ryuu. He’s Riko’s twin.

Haida: *stretches his arm to Ryuu* Pleasure to meet you as well!

Ryuu: BAH! *turns away*

Haida: …okay, good talk. *pulls back*

Hisoka: Ah, maybe he’s just shy!

Rie: Erm…he isn’t…

Harumi: …so! Haida, Retsuko, what brought you two over to visit us? Outside of your adorable son, after all.

Retsuko: *blushes* Well, uh…should we tell them, honey?

Haida: Go ahead. 😊

Retsuko: *pulls the ring out of her pocket*

Rie: …is…is that…?

Retsuko: *nods, tears swelling up, as she smiles* H-he proposed!

*most of the room erupted in joy over this*

Hisoka: My son is getting married!

Hiroko: WHOOOO! PARTAAY!

Riko: AMAZING! 😀

Haida: …well, erm, we were actually coming to…*blushing, and scratching his head* well, get your blessings.

Harumi: Oh, Haida, your father and I would be overjoyed. Retsuko, you certainly have my blessing.

Hisoka: Mine too!

Retsuko: Oh! Th-thank you!

Haida: And, erm-

Rie: Well, for me, you absolutely have my blessing, Haida.

Haida: Thank you! …and, erm…Ryota?

Retsuko: …dad?

*a sudden silence arises, as they wait for an answer from him…*

Ryota:  ….*sigh*…if you’re wanting to get married to him, Retsuko…fine by me.

*most of the room either sighs of relief, or jumps around in excitement…minus Ryuu, but regardless*

Ryota: …just leave me out of it. *gets up, to walk out*

Retsuko: Wait, what?!

Hiroko: Did, did I hear him right?

Rie: Ryota! *follows him to the door* What do you mean by that?!

Ryota: I want nothing to do with whatever the hell she wants with this, that’s what I mean!

Rie: Are you insane?! That’s Retsuko, your own daughter!

Ryota: Oh, what, she can have a child out of wedlock, effectively making not only her, for her arrogance, but her own family a mockery, and try to weasel out of it with a marriage to the bastard child’s father, and I’m supposed to be 100% for it, because she’s my daughter?! Like hell, I am. Like. HELL.

Retsuko: Dad! Please, try to understa-*Ryota SLAMS the door shut* …..d-dad….

*the whole room goes quiet*

Ikari: …….*tilts his head* eeeeh?
